title: A sheet of insulating plastic material is inser...

content.prompt: A sheet of insulating plastic material is inserted between the plates without otherwise disturbing the system. What effect does this have on the capacitance?

choices.label: Nothing can be said about the effect without knowing the dielectric constant of the plastic.
Nothing can be said about the effect without knowing the thickness of the sheet.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
